Mereka yang Akan Gabung ke Partai Gelora
07 Nov 2019, 01:44 by Dewi Nurita, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Partai Gelora Indonesia tengah mempersiapkan acara deklarasi resmi. Senin lalu, para penggagas partai baru ini telah mendatangi notaris untuk mengurus akta pendirian perkumpulan, agar selanjutnya bisa mendapatkan status badan hukum partai dari Kementerian Hukum dan HAM.
Mayoritas penggagas partai ini adalah eks pimpinan PKS, seperti Anis Matta, Fahri Hamzah, Mahfudz Siddiq, Rofi Munawar, dan Achmad Rilyadi. "Deklarasi akan dilakukan jika semua aspek kelengkapannya sudah siap dan selesai semua. Kalau kelahiran Gelora Indonesia sudah pada 28 Oktober lalu, bertepatan Hari Sumpah Pemuda," ujar Mahfudz Siddiq saat dihubungi Tempo pada Rabu malam, 6 November 2019.
Selain eks kader, sejumlah kader PKS pun disebut akan merapat ke bakal partai baru ini. Mereka adalah Wakil Gubernur Kalimantan Timur, Hadi Mulyadi dan bekas Wakil Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta, Triwisaksana. "Mereka bagian dari pendiri," ujar Mahfudz.
Selain eks dan kader PKS, adapula Politikus Partai Demokrat, Deddy Mizwar yang disebut telah siap loncat pagar dan bergabung dengan Partai Gelora Indonesia.
Fahri Hamzah sebelumnya menargetkan partai ini ikut serta mendukung paslon dalam Pilkada 2020. Sebab, ujar Fahri, banyak di antara para inisiator partai ini merupakan kepala daerah inkumben atau orang yang punya peluang jadi kepala daerah. Fahri menyebut nama Hadi Mulyadi dan Triwisaksana sebagai calon kepala daerah inkumben atau orang yang punya peluang didukung Partai Gelora menjadi kepala daerah pada Pilkada 2020 mendatang.
Saat dikonfirmasi, Triwisaksana meminta publik menunggu kejutan Partai Gelora. "Tunggu saja, akan dibahas lebih dalam nanti setelah deklarasi," ujar pria yang akrab disapa Bang Sani ini, saat dihubungi kemarin malam.

Those Who Will Join the Gelora Party
Nov 7 2019, 01:44 by Dewi Nurita, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian Gelora Party is preparing an official declaration event. Last Monday, the initiators of the new party came to the notary to take care of the deed of the establishment of the association, so that they could later obtain the status of the party's legal entity from the Ministry of Justice and Human Rights.
The majority of the initiators of this party were former PKS leaders, such as Anis Matta, Fahri Hamzah, Mahfudz Siddiq, Rofi Munawar, and Achmad Rilyadi. "The declaration will be made if all aspects are complete and everything is complete. If the birth of the Indonesian Gelora was on October 28, the Youth Pledge Day coincides," Mahfudz Siddiq said when contacted by Tempo on Wednesday night, November 6, 2019.
In addition to the former cadres, a number of PKS cadres were also said to be close to the new party. They are the Deputy Governor of East Kalimantan, Hadi Mulyadi and the former Deputy Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DPRD, Triwisaksana. "They are part of the founder," Mahfudz said.
In addition to ex and PKS cadres, there is also a Democrat Politician, Deddy Mizwar who is said to have been ready to jump the fence and join the Indonesian Gelora Party.
Fahri Hamzah previously targeted this party to participate in supporting pairs in the 2020 elections. Because, Fahri said, many of the party's initiators were incumbent regional heads or people who had the opportunity to become regional leaders. Fahri mentioned the names of Hadi Mulyadi and Triwisaksana as incumbent regional head candidates or people who had the opportunity to be supported by the Gelora Party to become regional heads in the upcoming 2020 elections.
When confirmed, Triwisaksana asked the public to wait for the surprise of the Gelora Party. "Just wait, it will be discussed later after the declaration," said the man who is familiarly called Bang Sani, when contacted last night.
